name: 66,666,666 Souls
description:
Hell has just been put under new management and you're determined to make the investors happy by hitting the quarterly goal of 66,666,666 souls. Clicker game made for Clicker Jam Winter 2023.

Game length should last for a few hours, but it can run in the background, so just leave it running if you are sick of clicking.

All art by me.
